Source code for tests.test_units

import pytest
import random
from app import Units



[docs]def test_do_attack():
    solder = Units.Solder()
    solder.set_health(100)
    if solder.get_health > 0 and solder.check_attack():
        soldiers_attack = 0.5 * (1 + solder.get_health) * \
                          random.randint(50 + solder.get_experience, 100) / 100
    else:
        soldiers_attack = 0
    assert solder.do_attack == soldiers_attack
